name: slack-connect-monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir /s /q backend\dist frontend\dist backend\node_modules frontend\node_modules node_modules
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend

description: Slack Connect - A full-stack Slack messaging and scheduling application
author: Muskan Gupta
